og.description: my insides are made out of outsides.  i bite.

pages/about.body:
this is the part i hate. writing about myself.

i‚Äôll start at the beginning:

  • grew up in alaska, 4th * generational irish people, been here and there the past few years.
  • roamed the planet racing bikes and skis. this before phones, gps, or * digital cameras.
  • raised a family in boulder, colorado.
  • researched life on earth from space for about a decade.
  • wrote a ton of software, some that i am even proud of.
  • founded, built, and ran dojo4 for almost exactly a decade.
  • ranted about the dangerous of big tech, and responbility of software developers, in kyiv 2015.
  • mentored dozens of techstars startups, worked with and for over a hundred.
  • 2020 // COVID // massive life changes. collapse. like everyone else.
  • subsequently, a ton of * mountains.
  • somehow managed to get lost in the southwest for the 42‚Äônd time in my life.
  • started riding my bike to * alaska.
  • met a girl in LA.
  • almost died in an ice cave.
  • been cranking on a new stuff.
  • and riding bikes with a broken leg.

this is absolutely and _always a work in progress‚Ä¶

so check back soon or just contact me if you are a-wondering wtf is up?
